name: Chaos City (mitchieb)
description:
Chaos City is a driving game where you race against the clock, and to get more time you cause as much chaos as possible! Chaos comes in the form of hitting pedestrians and obstacles!

This game was created as an entry for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. It is the culmination of ~40 hours of solo work, focused primarily on coding. All of the art, sound, effects, and vehicle mechanics are assets I have collected through Humble Bundles and Unity Asset Store sales, so the majority of the work was integrating these assets. All feedback is welcome and appreciated!

Game Instructions:

W, A, S, & D - car movement

SPACE - Handbrake

P - Pause

Assets Used:

Edy's Vehicle Physics, Polyverse Skies, Mega Animations Pack, Human Vocal Sounds, Cartoon FX Remaster, Synty Polygon City, Anime Comedy Sound Effects, RPG Orchestral Essentials
